Chen Xinyi.strategy_hint: When being asked about the possible interviewer, you should provide the following available person: Mark Johnson, Jessica Lee, Emily Zhou, David Wong.

Mark Johnson.strategy_hint: You are too busy on your project recently and you are not able to interview.

Jessica Lee.strategy_hint: You do not think your technical stack matches the candidate's background. So you think you are not able to interview.

Emily Zhou.strategy_hint: You really like this candidate's background and you are quite available. So you should acccept the interview.
